#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#define deepak 1000000007
using namespace std;
inline void scanint(long long *a);
long long gcd(long long,long long);
 inline void scanint(long long *a)
{
register char c=0;
while(c<33)c=getchar_unlocked();
*a=0;
while(c>33)
{
*a=*a*10+c-'0';
c=getchar_unlocked();
}
}
int main()
{
long long t;
//scanf("%lld",&t);
scanint(&t);
while(t--)
{
long long a,b;
long long c[100004]={0};
//memset(c,0,100004);
//scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
scanint(&a);
scanint(&b);
long long k=gcd(a,b);
c[0]=0;
c[1]=1;
for(int i=2;i<=k;i++)
c[i]=((c[i-1]%deepak)+(c[i-2]%deepak))%deepak;
printf("%lld\n",c[k]);
}
return 0;
}
long long gcd(long long a,long long b)
{
if(b==0)
return a;
else
return gcd(b,a%b);
}
